title: Quickcast and map bugs?
body: I'm having trouble when in game I cant seem to be able to quickcast like I used to and where I now have to click again with my mouse rather then just being able to press qwer, its with almost every ability and causes me to have delays and missing some more crucial moments in my games as well as have my teammates on my back for not healing, malph ulting, etc correctly. Ive also noticed that I cannot left click on the map any more, its been almost a year since I last played league and let my friend use my account while I wasn't playing, is there some settings that they've changed that I've missed or is my league bugged?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Seras already answered your quickcast problem below.

For the minimap issue, try hitting **ALT+M** in game and let me know if it helps.

Well you can turn quickcast on by clicking the little lightning bolts under abilities/items in the esc menu (under hotkeys). Is that the problem there? 

As for not being able to click on the map, I'm not sure about that one. I'm not aware of any setting that would turn that off but I'll have a look for you.
